page.title: 06Road Traffic in Durris
page.content: Our block has mostly back roads which have little traffic.The only main road is the South Deeside road to Aberdeen.It is very busy in the morning and again in the evening.This is because people from Banchory are going to and from their work in Aberdeen.A lot of tractors use the roads.We don't have buses on our roads except for a limited service on the main road,plus the school bus.Cars on the roads belong to local people or others out for a drive in the country. We get a lot of timber lorries and others carrying sand.You can't get past lorries on the road.Our roads are sometimes blocked in winter because of heavy snow and the snowploughs take a while to get round to us.Many local people get around on bikes,especially the children,even though the roads are hilly.
